documentation.text:
@title The interface of the Order contract
 @author Amos Tan, Oden Peterson (COMP6452 2023T2 Group 22)
@notice event emitted when the order is updated by the delivery point centres
@notice Verify the order by the seller
@notice Verify the order by the shipper
@notice check if the order has been paid
@notice update shipment by the delivery point centres
@notice buyer acknowledges that they have received the order and verify the receipt
@notice get status whether the order is verified by the seller
@notice get status whether the order is verified by the shipper

devdoc.author: Amos Tan, Oden Peterson (COMP6452 2023T2 Group 22)
devdoc.title: The interface of the Order contract

ShipmentUpdated(uint256,string).notice: event emitted when the order is updated by the delivery point centres

getIsVerifiedBySeller().notice: get status whether the order is verified by the seller

getIsVerifiedByShipper().notice: get status whether the order is verified by the shipper

isPaid().notice: check if the order has been paid

updateShipment(uint256).notice: update shipment by the delivery point centres

verifyOrderBySeller(bool).notice: Verify the order by the seller

verifyOrderByShipper(bool).notice: Verify the order by the shipper

verifyReceipt().notice: buyer acknowledges that they have received the order and verify the receipt
